Package Activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivityBank
    General class that contains all activities that need to be launched on demand Also contains many common test methods used for setup or for navigating through the app
    AddGeoActivity  
    AddProblemActivity
    AddProblemActivity Allow patient to add a new problem by inputing title and description
    AddRecordActivity
    AddRecordActivity Allow patient to add a new record Inputs: title, description Inputs: body location photos, photos Inputs: geolocation
    AddReminderActivity  
    BackBodyLocationActivity
    BackBodyLocationActivity Used in add record Allow patient to select back body location
    BodyLocationActivity
    BodyLocationActivity Used in add record Allow patient to select front body location
    BrowseBodyLocationPhotosActivity
    BrowseBodyLocationPhotosActivity For a specific record: + Patient can see a grid view of body location photos associated to that record + Patient can long click to delete body location photo associated to that record + Patient can click a button add body location photo associated to that record
    BrowseProblemRecords
    BrowseProblemRecords For a specific problem: + Patient can see a list of all records associated to that problem + Patient can long click to delete a record associated to that problem + Patient can long click to modify a record associated to that problem + Patient can click a button to add a record associated to that problem + Patient can click to view a record associated to that problem
    BrowseProblemsActivity
    BrowseProblemRecords For a specific patient: + Patient can see a list of all problems associated to that patient + Patient can long click to delete a problem associated to that patient + Patient can long click to modify a problem associated to that patient + Patient can click a button to add a problem associated to that patient + Patient can click to view a problem associated to that patient
    BrowseRecordPhotosActivity
    BrowseRecordPhotosActivity This activity is started when browse_record_photos_id button is clicked in the ViewRecordActivity.
    BrowseUserActivity
    BrowseUserActivity Shows a list of patients when a provider is using the application, it allows the provider to add a patient using a valid patientID when a patientID is clicked on the list all their problems will be shown.
    BrowseUserActivityTest  
    CameraActivity
    CameraActivity Takes a bodylocation photo or normal photo and save it either to temporary database or online, offline database Photo is associated to specific record, specific problem
    CheckSecurityToken  
    CheckSecurityTokenActivityTest  
    DrawBodyLocationActivity
    DrawBodyLocationActivity Used in add record Allow patient to save body location photo that they draw on
    HomeMenuActivity  
    ImageAdapter
    ImageAdapter Custom image adapter that shows grid view photos and its label
    Login
    Login Allows a user to enter a short code generated by another logged in instance of a user to pull a copy of the security token needed to log into that account.
    LoginInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ModifyPatientActivity
    ModifyPatientActivity Simply allows the Patient to change their contact information (Email and phone number)
    ModifyProblemActivity
    ModifyProblemActivity Simply allows the Patient to change a selected problem's title and description.
    ModifyProviderActivity
    ModifyProviderActivity Simply allows the Provider to modify their contact information (Email and Phone number)
    ModifyRecordActivity
    ModifyRecordActivity Simply modifies a selected record Title, date, description, geolocation can be modified.
    PatientHomeMenuActivity
    PatientHomeMenuActivity Home menu for a patient, this activity contains the options for a patient to edit their contact information, view their profile's details, view a list of their problems, generate a code used for logging into a different device.
    PatientHomeMenuActivityTest  
    ProviderAddCommentRecord
    ProviderAddCommentRecord Activity that allows the provider to add a Comment Record into the the list of the records of a chosen Problem.
    ProviderBrowsePatientProblems
    ProviderBrowsePatientProblems This shows the provider a list of problems owned by the selected patient.
    ProviderBrowseProblemRecords
    ProviderBrowseProblemRecords Displays a chosen problem's list of records to the provider this allows the provider the chance to add a comment record.
    ProviderHomeMenuActivity
    ProviderHomeMenuActivity This is the home menu for a Provider, it contains options for the current logged in provider to view a list of patients, view their profiles information, generate a login code used for logging into other devices and edit their contact information
    ProviderHomeMenuActivityTest  
    ProviderViewPatientProblem
    ProviderViewPatientProblem Activity simply displays the information of a problem to the provider A provider can view/add the problems records A provider can view the photos in a slideshow A provider can view the geolocation of a problem
    ProviderViewPatientRecordActivity
    ProviderViewPatientRecordActivity A provider can view patient's record
    SearchActivity  
    SearchActivityTest  
    SearchActivityTestPatient  
    SearchActivityTestProvider  
    SetBodyLocationPhoto
    SetBodyLocationPhoto Activity Used in view record When patient clicked on body location photo, it will redirect to this activty Show grid view body location photos, Set body location photo to the photo that patient click
    SetRecordDisplayPhotos
    SetBodyLocationPhoto Activity Used in add record When patient clicked on body location photo, it will redirect to this activty Show grid view body location photos, Set body location photo to the photo that patient click
    SignUp
    Sign Up Allows a user to create their own profile.
    SignUpInstrumentedTest  
    SlideshowActivity
    SlideshowActivity Show slide show photos for all records in a problem
    SlideShowViewPagerAdapter
    SlideShowViewPagerAdapter Custom view pager adapter that shows slide show photos of all records for a problem
    ViewAddedPhotoActivity
    ViewAddedPhotoActivity Used in add record Show in a grid view all temporary saved photos
    ViewCommentRecordActivity
    ViewCommentRecordActivity Displays the information of a selected CommentRecord created by a Provider - creator UserID, comment, title, date created.
    ViewGeoActivity  
    ViewMapActivity  
    ViewProblemActivity
    ViewProblemActivity Simply displays the details and information of a selected problem Contains title,date,description, number of records, buttons to view map, records and a photo slideshow and a button that allows the patient to set a reminder
    ViewRecordActivity
    ViewRecordActivity Simply displays the details and information of a selected record Contains title,date,description, body location photos, record photos and geolocation.
    ViewRecordPhotoActivity
    ViewRecordPhotoActivity Simply displays a selected photo from when an image is selected in browse record photos
    ViewUserActivity
    Used to View a user.
    ViewUserActivityTest
    General class that contains all activities that need to be launched on demand Also contains many common test methods used for setup or for navigating through the app
